title: Smart Data Models - Pss1A
description: Adapted from CIM data models. Single input power system stabilizer. It is a modified version in order to allow representation of various vendors' implementations on PSS type 1A.

type.description: Property. NGSI type. It has to be Pss1A

a1.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Notch filter parameter (A1). Default: 0.0

a2.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Notch filter parameter (A2). Default: 0.0

a3.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Notch filter parameter (A3). Default: 0.0

a4.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Notch filter parameter (A4). Default: 0.0

a5.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Notch filter parameter (A5). Default: 0.0

a6.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Notch filter parameter (A6). Default: 0.0

a7.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Notch filter parameter (A7). Default: 0.0

a8.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Notch filter parameter (A8). Default: 0.0

inputSignalType.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Type of input signal. Default: None

kd.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Selector (Kd).  true = e used false = e not used. Default: False

t1.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Lead/lag time constant (T1). Default: 0

t2.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Lead/lag time constant (T2). Default: 0

t3.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Lead/lag time constant (T3). Default: 0

t4.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Lead/lag time constant (T4). Default: 0

t5.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Washout time constant (T5). Default: 0

t6.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Transducer time constant (T6). Default: 0

vcl.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Stabilizer input cutoff threshold (Vcl). Default: 0.0

vcu.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Stabilizer input cutoff threshold (Vcu). Default: 0.0

vrmax.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Maximum stabilizer output (Vrmax). Default: 0.0

vrmin.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Minimum stabilizer output (Vrmin). Default: 0.0
